name: 2nd Edition of World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference
content: Following the colossal success of our previous conference, Magnus Group invites you to become a part of HYBRID EVENT - “2nd Edition of World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference” (WAC 2022) scheduled on May 18-19, 2022 at Tokyo, Japan. WAC 2022 is scheduled in Hybrid Format with both onsite and virtual versions. We believe that our decision will enable broad participation. The global congress enlightens on the theme “Milestones and impeccable innovations ushering to a new era of aquaculture and fisheries” which acknowledges the recent advancements, newest updates, innovations and challenges that impact the field of fisheries, marine biology and aquaculture.
